Quality Education.reason: As a university language course, it directly provides education by helping students build '德語的基礎能力' (foundational ability in German) and '增加多元的外語能力' (increase diverse foreign language skills).

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: The syllabus explicitly promotes responsible consumption by stating '維護智慧財產權，務必使用正版書籍' (Respect Copyright. Be sure to use genuine books) and not to use photocopies.

Partnerships for the Goals.reason: The course fosters intercultural partnerships at an individual level by encouraging students to '想交德國朋友' (want to make German friends) and '主動照顧政大外籍生' (proactively care for international students).
